meta.title: Skyesoft Rebuild Roadmap
meta.description: Roadmap aligned with Codex governance, Repository Inventory (RNV) standards, camelCase conventions, semantic AI architecture, and the Unified Client Framework (Office Board + Index Page + Page Registry).

phases.name: Codex + Sovereignty Foundation
tasks: Codex upgraded with Constitution, Meta, Tier-2 Standards, and Tier-3 Modules
Document Engine architecture ratified; legacy module fragmentation removed
Repository Standard adopted (canonical directory structure + naming enforcement)
Semantic Responder Standard and RAG Framework approved
AI Integration Standard approved
Skyebot constitutional prompt schema finalized
Parliamentarian Review logic embedded into askOpenAI.php
Deployment sovereignty reaffirmed — Skyesoft runs solely on skyelighting.com
Codex UI Page Registry requirement approved
RNV Identifier Standard adopted for Repository Inventory
phases.output: Codex structural foundation finalized — the system’s constitutional layer is stable

phases.name: Repository + UI Infrastructure Alignment
tasks: Synchronize repository with canonical structure defined in Repository Standard
Enforce camelCase naming across all files and directories
Deploy Codex, iconMap.json, prefixRegistry.json, intentMatrix.json, promptTemplates.json
Publish Tier-2 SSE documents: getDynamicData.php, getVersions.php, documentIndex.json, versions.json
Ensure Codex files remain immutable except via amendment
Restore index.html and officeBoard.html under the Unified Client Framework
Polish officeBoard.html (layout, transitions, header status block alignment)
Create new index.html following Codex UI standards
Create and publish pageRegistry.json (complete UI inventory with semantic purpose)
Deploy shared JS modules: app.js, sse.js, ui.js, weather.js, skyebot.js
Propagate versionContext via getVersions.php under Version Governance Standard
Initialize Document Engine structure (templates, schema, binding rules)
Activate repositoryAuditor.php for compliance checks (RNV validation, camelCase checks, JSON meta verification)
Create Prefix Registry Standard (PRF) under Codex governance, defining all 3-letter system prefixes (RNV, DOC, INV, JOB, EST, SUR, CNT, ENT, LOC, PRM, UPG, etc.) and their allocation rules
phases.output: Repository, UI, Codex, RNV, and SSE pipeline aligned with Codex governance

phases.name: Live SSE + Dashboard Integration
tasks: Implement full real-time SSE stream following Tier-2 SSE Standard
Dashboard consumes only SSE (time, weather, holiday, TIS state, versionContext)
Add stale-signal and degraded-SSE health indicators
Enable sseIntegrityChecker.php and integrate reports into audit pipeline
phases.output: Office Board becomes a fully real-time, Codex-compliant operational display

phases.name: Skyebot Contact Intake (Semantic + RAG-driven)
tasks: Skyebot interprets email signatures and freeform prompts using semantic parsing
Prevent duplicate contacts, entities, and locations via Codex identity rules
Store new contacts using Prefix Registry governance
Document Engine auto-generates confirmation documents when needed
phases.output: AI-powered semantic contact creation integrated into the operational workflow

phases.name: Database Migration (JSON → SQL)
tasks: Design SQLite schema (entities, locations, contacts, permits, documents)
Migrate JSON objects into SQL tables under Referential Integrity
Replace JSON reads for Office Board metrics with SQL queries
phases.output: Centralized relational data layer stabilizes long-term operations

phases.name: Document Engine Activation
tasks: Activate Document Engine as the unified generator for all document types
Use Document Catalog for permitFeeReport, photoSurvey, workOrderRequest, etc.
Add metadata indexing + lineage tracking to documentIndex.json
Restore floating header/footer rendering for all document types
phases.output: Professional-grade document automation across all Skyesoft operations

summaryTimeline.result: Repository + UI unified; RNV + naming + SSE ready
